column4: i though ubuntu is always under dev. as in they release a new version every 6 months right?
But there's a period of a month or so when all they do is bugfixes.
Breezy badger only gets bugfixes from now on.
All the new stuff is going to Dapper.
Well, it is only a test build of Dapper...
can u help me with the repos please?
u said u designed a new GDM theme
Kinda... I hacked at a default Ubuntu one until it looked very different :)
It's modelled on Lord of the Rings... it replaces the Ubuntu logo with the Eye of Sauron, surrounded by the ring.
ok... sorry..just curious..i think i had seen someone with a same nick there..
Cool.  Aside from freenode, I've only ever been on Quakenet, and those were some pretty small channels. :)
hehe... maybe someone liked ur nick..and kept it for himself :P
